version_description: Updated for iOS7, various bug fixes and improvements.
Updated for iOS7, various bug fixes and improvements.

- Fixed an issue that sometimes prevented access to local Contacts and Groups
- Fixed a number formatting issue on registration screen

- Fixed an issue that sometimes prevented access to local Contacts and Groups
- Fixed a number formatting issue on registration screen
Minor bug fix. ES and DE regions incorrectly show info message stating 1 Credit = 1 Message.
Minor bug fix. ES and DE regions incorrectly show info message stating 1 Credit = 1 Message.

- This version resolves the local groups access issue.
- Bug fixes and tweaks
- Tested on all models, including iPhone X running iOS 11.1
- Replaced deprecated components with their newer counterparts
